1b1('bum): rgya gar skad du// sha ta sA ha prad nya pa ra myi ta// bod skad du/ dag/
1b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag de rgya padum bu dang po bam po thog ma'o// /
1b3('bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
1b4('bum): khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong dgyi dge'
1b5('bum): chen po dang / thabs ga cig ste/ thams cad klu dgra bcom pa/ zag bzang
1b6('bum): nyon mongs pa myed pa dbang du gyur pa/ sems shi nad tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin
2a1('bum): khur bor ba/ rang kyi don rab tu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang
2a2('bum): thams cad la pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyu nad tu zhugs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// dge slong ma
2a3('bum): grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo las stsogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma shi nad tu mang ba kund kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub
2a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed grangs myed pa thams cad kyang / gzungs rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par
2a5('bum): spyod pa/ mtshan ma myed pa'i spyod yul can// rtog pa myed pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs
2a6('bum): pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstand pa zad myi shes la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par skye ba/ mngon par shes pa zhen
2a7('bum): tu ma nyams pa mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo myed cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la myi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa myed pa/ kha gsag myed pa
2a8('bum): grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems myed pa/ zang zing myed pa'i chos ston dpa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ myi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa
2b1('bum): yid yongs su zhum pa myed pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol
2b2('bum): po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil dkyis myi nod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa
2b3('bum): bskal dpa grangs myed pa nas smon lam shi nang tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro gnyer myed pa/ snyand cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ @
2b4('bum): rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs brjod pa la mkhas pa spobs pa myi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zild kyis gnond pa'i myi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal
2b5('bum): pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstand pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung bal mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / sbyin rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmyi lam dang / sma brnyan dang /
2b6('bum): myig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa myed pa sems can thams cad kyil
2b7('bum): sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du rgyud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la spang ba myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa
2b8('bum): rlabs chen po dang ldan du/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas/ gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems
3a1('bum): la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dab shi nad tu thob pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ nyend pa rtogs par
3a2('bum): bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rtenang cing 'bresad par 'thung ba'i tshul zad phyogs pa la zhugs pa/ smra ba dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor
3a3('bum): ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu'i bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar
3a4('bum): rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstadadu pa tshang myed pa la 'jigs pa byed pa/ bdag nyid jilta ba/ bzhin du 'ong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs
3a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zind pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gra ngas myed pa na/ bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su
3a6('bum): dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par mngon tu gyurd pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas
3a7('bum): pa' sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la
3a8('bum): mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par myi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang / thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang
3b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin can 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang
3b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang
3b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang
3b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b5('bum): chen po blo gros 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba
3b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib myed blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b7('bum): po mthu' dam pas rnam par gnond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang /
3b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi me'i snying po dang
4a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tho gros dpe' byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
4a2('bum): ram gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
4a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'jom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rje mo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen
4a4('bum): phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub
4a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang / byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa 'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
4a6('bum): chen po ri bo'o zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag
4a7('bum): dang / thabs kacig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdan seng ge'i khri ba shams nas sku drang por bsring ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas
4a8('bum): skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting
4b1('bum): nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba lu mnyam par gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mabyed pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas
4b2('bum): kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas/ sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo chibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od gzer
4b3('bum): bye ba zag zhig brgya song drug cu drug cu thung ngo // zhabs kyi so mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba zag khrig brgya skyong drug cu drug tu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba thag
4b4('bum): thig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drugacu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od
4b5('bum): gzer bye ba zag zhig brgya skyong drug cu drug cu thung ngo // zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // su sta zur gnyis lam
4b6('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // sku rtsi ba logs gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer
4b7('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od
4b8('bum): gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba zag
5a1('bum): khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // mgur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // chems mche ba bzhi las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu
5a2('bum): zung ngo // tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // spyan gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // swArwa gnyis nas
5a3('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // shangs kyi sbubs gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang
5a4('bum): 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // steng ge spyi gcug nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya s+ho/ nga drug cu byung ngo // zhus kyi sgo nas kyang 'od gzer bye
5a5('bum): xxx
5a6('bum): cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kang ka'i klung gi
5a7('bum): bye ma snyed sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
5a8('bum): krung ki bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs
5b1('bum): 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
5b2('bum): byas so// nub byang kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kyang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
5b3('bum): ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des
5b4('bum): gangs meg par gyur pa de dag thams dang sung drag pa ga pa ma kyim ldan 'das kyis pa pa'i so thams cad
5b5('bum): 'od gzer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
5b6('bum): kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig
5b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs
5b8('bum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
6a1('bum): par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams
6a2('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khas
6a3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6a4('bum): byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba
6a5('bum): chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kang
6a6('bum): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang
6a7('bum): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ki'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs marnams
6a8('bum): su 'jig rten gyi 'ams ga ga'i gling gi bye ma med pas chen pos byab par mdzad do// so nub kyi phyogs mthams su 'jig rkyedan gyi 'ams gang ka'i klung gi khyim snyed sdang ba chen pos khyab par ma dza
6b1('bum): nu byad kyi phyogs mthams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka klung gi khyim sred snang ba chen pos thub par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten kyi 'ams gang ka'i klung gi khyim med snang ba chen pos khyab par
6b2('bum): mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyu rad pa
6b3('bum): ngag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
6b4('bum): 'i 'dig rkyen gyi 'ams 'dithams cad lpags kyi dbang pos/ khyab par ma'adanas dul 'dus ba mdzad do// sngags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzes 'dog su chog
6b5('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ke ser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ mdab ma stong dang ldan
6b6('bum): ba sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ wA na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ khaM dog bzang ba/ dri zhim bi/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa yin 'di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur tu
6b7('bum): byad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid stonang pa mdzad de/ de dag sharang phyogs kyi 'dzi
6b8('bum): rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// de dag lho
7a1('bum): ya phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston tu
7a2('bum): de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston te
7a3('bum): de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stonang te
7a4('bum): de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ka/ nga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byo/ na nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang
7a5('bum): ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// de ga shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA 'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas
7a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing
7a7('bum): de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stonang to// de dag nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma
7a8('bum): snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga/
7b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stonang to// de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kas
7b2('bum): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// sems can gang gis chos
7b3('bum): de dag thos par gyur pa de thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ba dan seng ge'i khro de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas
7b4('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam pa ra bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum
7b5('bum): ku nad tu 'gul to// ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kund tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kund tu 'ur 'ur
7b6('bum): shIk+ki shik+ka/ rab tu shig shig/ kund tu shig shig go// mtha' mtho' na ni dpung dma'/ dpung mthon ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bkas kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams
7b7('bum): cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang gcig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol
8a1('bum): song kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / myi 'om pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te
8a2('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / ltar skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyu rad to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul
8a3('bum): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang / myi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs
8a4('bum): rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas/ dka' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur da pa de dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas
8a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyur da to// de na/ sa de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
8a6('bum): can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song kyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams
8a7('bum): cad kyang myi dang / ltar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te
8a8('bum): rjes su dran nas kyang / dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur da pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
8b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par
8b2('bum): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song kyi skye gnas thams cad dang /
8b3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag
8b4('bum): dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dka' ba dang / mos pa dang
8b5('bum): nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag
8b6('bum): gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur da to// de nas de'i tshe
8b7('bum): skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gyi skye gnas thams cad dang / ka shin rje'i 'jig rten
8b8('bum): thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / ltar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag
9a1('bum): dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa
9a2('bum): de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
9a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
9a4('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi khom pa thams
9a5('bum): cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /
9a6('bum): nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur da te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
9a7('bum): dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing / phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
9a8('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang
9b1('bum): kwa'i klung gi kyim med kyi sems can myal pathams cad dang / rgyas song kyi sbyi gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang chun mang/ kyi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyu
9b2('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang ltar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dka' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur
9b3('bum): te'/ rjes su dran nas kyang / dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
9b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
9b5('bum): la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas detshel skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lho'i phyogs ma tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
9b6('bum): kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song kyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems
9b7('bum): can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par
9b8('bum): gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyu rad pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
10a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
10a2('bum): la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur da to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang
10a3('bum): byol song gyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / lhar skal ba mnya
10a4('bum): bar skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dag 'a ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang
10a5('bum): dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par rgyu rang pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de ba/ zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
10a6('bum): rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud para'
10a7('bum): gyurang to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gyi
10a8('bum): skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / lhar skal ba mnya
10b1('bum): bar skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang lha de dag dka' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang / dga' ba dang / mos pa dang
10b2('bum): nyams pade bathob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du ngong 'ang phyin pa
10b3('bum): 'bas la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la
10b4('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song kyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams
10b5('bum): cad kyang rgyun chad myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang / lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang
10b6('bum): lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur da te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de
10b7('bum): dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin
10b8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang kan
11a1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song kyi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi 'om pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/
11a2('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur da te/
11a3('bum): rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyu rad pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
11a4('bum): gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing
11a5('bum): xxx
11a6('bum): mthong bar gyur to// 'dod pa rnams kyi ngan pas smrathos par gyur to// smon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'thugs pa rnams kyang 'jug pa myed pa'i sems thob par gyur tu
11a7('bum): kos myed pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to//
11a8('bum): nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad myed par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal pa rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to//
11b1('bum): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba myi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba myi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems
11b2('bum): can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang / ma dang / pu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams
11b3('bum): cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba myed de/ myi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams
11b4('bum): cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dperadage slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur te//
11b5('bum): de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang lA na bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge
11b6('bum): ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la myi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyu rang to// de'i tshe bcom ldan
11b7('bum): 'das bdan seng ge'i blo de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma bsgribs pa myed pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor
11b8('bum): sbyar/ stong gsum rgya blo chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ Shor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ s+tha da
12a1('bum): lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ 'di zild kyis man nad te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal
12a2('bum): gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zild kyis mnand te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid
12a3('bum): dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis man nad te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi
12a4('bum): brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rte na gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zild kyis mnand te
12a5('bum): 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
12a6('bum): snyed zi yid kyis mnan d+he/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kang ga'i klung
12a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed zil kyis man nad te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi' brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
12a8('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis man nad te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du shar lho'i
12b1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zild kyis mnand te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so
12b2('bum): de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis mnand te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / kazi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lha ma me/ lhan ne
12b3('bum): lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed zild kyis mnand te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes
12b4('bum): shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis man nad te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang
12b5('bum): gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi bye ma snyed zild kyis mnan te
12b6('bum): 'od dang sku mdog dang / bzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ra rib ri nag po gzhan zild kyis gnond par gnas
12b7('bum): pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zild kyis gnond par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/
12b8('bum): lgang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zild kyis gnond par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
13a1('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten pa dang cas/ dbang po dang bcas rba/ sa pa dang sa pa/ kun ma'i gnas dang rgyas pa/ yid kyis ka dad par bzugs pa yang 'ang
13a2('bum): skum don dang / 'i brjid dang / dpas kyis mdzes kyi mas nasmya no// 'o// den pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyim song gsum rgya mang chen po'i 'jig rten gyilams 'dir/
13a3('bum): ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin kyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstand to// de nas stong gsum gyi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi spyi'i ris dang / kun sdang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang
13a4('bum): gzhan 'brum dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dag dang / mchim dang / sum nu ma gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sa gang ji skyed pa de dag thams cad kyis
13a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas padang seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa mthong nas dag 'azhi stong dang ga yi pade 'di drub tu na
13a6('bum): bde ba dang / yid byed pa skyes nas/ lA rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lA rdzas kyi spos dang / lA rdzas kyi thug pu dang / lA rdzas kyi phye ma dang / rdzas kyi thug pos
13a7('bum): lha rdzas kyi ud pa laM dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na lin dang / so'u kan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lga rdzas kyi ni bza' dang
13a8('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ me tog dang /
13b1('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / zug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na lin dang / so'u kan d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang
13b2('bum): ta ma la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyand dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to//
13b3('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i myi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom
13b4('bum): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin cing / bcom ldan 'ad sa la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma las sogs pa
13b5('bum): xxx
13b6('bum): kyi dbu'i steng ki nam mkha' la me tog las stsogs pa'i 'ang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to// khang pa brirtsegs pa de las kyang /
13b7('bum): rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar kyi lnga ldi mang po 'byung bar gyur to// mngon par 'byung bar gyur to/ rab tu 'brang bar gyur to// me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi de dag gis song gsum kyi sto
13b8('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gi nang tu mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi 'dog la bu des kyang / shinang tu mdzes shing / lAm me/ wAn ne/ ljang rer cu
14a1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du sharang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing
14a2('bum): gsal bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams
14a3('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des
14a4('bum): khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang shard kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur
14a5('bum): tol/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho
14a6('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// rub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
14a7('bum): gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan
14a8('bum): 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur da to//
14b1('bum): de la 'dzam bu'i gling ki myi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos
14b2('bum): sbyor to ste m-i rlon 'dza mo bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji snyar sems pa de bzhin du nub kyi bgrang spyod kyi kyi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du
14b3('bum): sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// shar kyi lus 'phags po'i mya rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes
14b4('bum): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur dute/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun ra bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// byang gi sgra myi snyan gyi myi rnams
14b5('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bsu chog myi shes pa n+yaHnganas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos
14b6('bum): gon to snyam mo// ts+tshol tshor ba'i'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sru bal pas chog kyi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bang/
14b7('bum): cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems pa
14b8('bum): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// mche ma'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas
15a1('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
15a2('bum): sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyis
15a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag kyi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// gzhan
15a4('bum): xxx
15a5('bum): mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// chu ngas ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas cho ga myi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
15a6('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong na/
15a7('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
15a8('bum): blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
15b1('bum): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo//
15b2('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyurd te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston
15b3('bum): to snyam mo// chung snang gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyu rad te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun nal
15b4('bum): bzhugs shing / chos ston da to snyam mo// tshad myed sdang ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas ga myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur
15b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sna blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas
15b6('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// dge bi'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes
15b7('bum): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// lung dge'i sgra rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ba
15b8('bum): bas chog kyi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di sam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos sod to mam mo// chad byed dge ba'i lha rnams kyis
16a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// dge
16a2('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo
16a3('bum): che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo
16a4('bum): chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas cho ga myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
16a5('bum): chos stond to snyam mo// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs par
16a6('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa smra blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
16a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// myi che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du
16a8('bum): sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes
16b1('bum): pa'i mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul
16b2('bum): blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de
16b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// 'og sbyin
16b4('bum): kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas cho ga myi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing
16b5('bum): chos stonang to snyam mo// de bzhin du stong ko 'jig rten gyi kha kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshe sa pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam
16b6('bum): du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis
16b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam dul sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// stong gsum gyi
16b8('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
17a1('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos stond to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba dan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong
17a2('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ki bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
17a3('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
17a4('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga 'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//
17a5('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur da to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ki
17a6('bum): bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
17a7('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu sdang bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyu rad to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
17a8('bum): rten gyi khams 'di ni sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// shar da phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag
17b2('bum): na'/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag
17b3('bum): kye thub pa dge slong gyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na
17b4('bum): sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi
17b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17b7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//
17b8('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can kang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan
18a1('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
18a2('bum): pa mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
18a3('bum): rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs
18a4('bum): gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'o// phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
18a5('bum): kis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub
18a6('bum): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyurd to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma
18a7('bum): snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
18a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
18b1('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
18b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi
18b3('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das
18b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu
18b5('bum): bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur da to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsu
18b6('bum): phyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
18b7('bum): sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi
18b8('bum): khams rin cen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ da byang chub sems
19a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
19a2('bum): dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas bcom
19a3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
19a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas de la 'a/ de skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar
19a5('bum): cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtse
19a6('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di
19a7('bum): ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
19a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu
19b1('bum): yi nad te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b2('bum): rin cen 'byung gnas la 'drin daces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyi mjed deng / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bu dagla bcom pa sang dag par rdzogs pa
19b3('bum): ngas rgyas ga khru de padang / rgyag bgyi'i dri na sa
19b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'an drang sgoms par 'jug pa rnams myed la dbang rab tu thob pa de dge ba lta bA'i skad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dis
19b5('bum): gshegs pa byung gnas kyis sa 'a na //
19b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gcer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin
19b7('bum): po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gi midag can stong bsgyu te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa des
19b8('bum): pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20a1('bum): po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
20a2('bum): pa dgra banom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /
20a3('bum): rab tu byungs dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20a4('bum): 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang
20a5('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya/ ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rtswa
20a6('bum): 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas
20a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas
20a8('bum): 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas/ bcom
20b1('bum): ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can lo ma stong
20b2('bum): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur
20b3('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pas pade mo de dag bzhes nas shor phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
20b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba re dar gtord to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi
20b5('bum): khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug po 'di nyid
20b6('bum): brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyurd to//
20b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
20b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod par byas so//
21a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po gnyis pa// / de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
21a2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan myed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i
21a3('bum): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten
21a4('bum): gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po mya ngan myed pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs
21a5('bum): pa'i sku blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin
21a6('bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig
21a7('bum): rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21a8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byed
21b1('bum): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21b2('bum): rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yi nad te de 'dra'o// de nas
21b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa dpal la 'di skad ces gsol
21b4('bum): to'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag
21b5('bum): kye thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bku ra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur da pa/ gzungs
21b6('bum): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshag
21b7('bum): ba mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can
22a1('bum): stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtord cig/
22a2('bum): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sem dan me dang chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par
22a3('bum): gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal de las
22a4('bum): pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag tha ngas te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag
22a5('bum): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
22a6('bum): dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyanang dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gos rim
22a7('bum): gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de
22a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
22b1('bum): tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la skun gyi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo ba dog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldanan
22b3('bum): bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22b4('bum): rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la ma chod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b5('bum): sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed po de ga ki/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor nga to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur da te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang
22b7('bum): po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid batshams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par
22b8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi
23a1('bum): dge ba'i thabs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so
23a2('bum): mchod pa byas so// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
23a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
23a4('bum): pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'ji ga rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas
23a5('bum): snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i sku blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro de la
23a7('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu
23a8('bum): ci'i rkyend// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems
23b1('bum): dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed
23b2('bum): ces bya ba yod de/ deran de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23b3('bum): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yi nad te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
23b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed
23b5('bum): der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang
23b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
23b7('bum): par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab
23b8('bum): par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phros byang chub sems
24a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
24a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor da cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi
24a3('bum): khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis
24a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
24a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs
24a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang
24a7('bum): zug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyand dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing
24a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba
24b1('bum): der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal da te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
24b2('bum): po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro/ bco
24b3('bum): ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo ba dog pa de'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab
24b4('bum): ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la la
24b5('bum): mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas
24b6('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// de nas
24b7('bum): pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di
24b8('bum): nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//
25a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i che bas/ bcom ldan
25a2('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang phyogs
25a3('bum): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang
25a5('bum): dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi kha mas de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen
25a6('bum): po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
25a7('bum): rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
25a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa
25b1('bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka'
25b2('bum): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
25b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te
25b4('bum): 'di ni de'i mthu yi nad te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
25b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'ji ka rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de
25b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
25b7('bum): kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa
25b8('bum): de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal da pa rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi
26a1('bum): mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
26a2('bum): byin la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya
26a3('bum): thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
26a4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis de nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis bcom ldan la
26a5('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te
26a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi sdang bar gyur nas
26a7('bum): byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
26a8('bum): na bza' dang / rgya nad dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
26b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas
26b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ @
26b3('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am
26b4('bum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
26b5('bum): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro//
26b6('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas/ pad mo de dag bzhes nas byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye
26b7('bum): ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
26b8('bum): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid batshams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa
27a1('bum): de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
27a2('bum): pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i tsha bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27a3('bum): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar gyi phyod su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed
27a4('bum): 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzind kyis brgya nad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
27a5('bum): rgyas ting nge 'dzin kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang
27a6('bum): dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang
27a7('bum): sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin kyi glang
27a8('bum): po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
