27b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang /
27b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam
27b3('bum): par gnond pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mdzad
27b4('bum): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' ses
27b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yind te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas
27b6('bum): rnam par gnond pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
27b7('bum): bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur
27b8('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyurar pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bslab pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
28a1('bum): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi
28a2('bum): bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal
28a3('bum): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom
28a4('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa del pad mo 'di dag gis gtor da cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag
28a5('bum): yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams
28a6('bum): par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
28a7('bum): rgyas ting nge 'dzind kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang /
28a8('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur da nas byang shard kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig/
28b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bka' dang / rgyand dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan /
28b2('bum): gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das
28b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tsha la te/ phyogs gcig tu
28b4('bum): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
28b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzind kyi glang po dam pa dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am
28b6('bum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gsor gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom
28b7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzind kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom
28b8('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi
29a1('bum): bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
29a2('bum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa de
29a3('bum): sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab
29a4('bum): tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
29a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig
29a6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shi nad tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
29a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid
29a8('bum): yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher
29b1('bum): g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal kang
29b2('bum): na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen
29b3('bum): po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
29b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs sa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka'
29b5('bum): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya
29b6('bum): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
29b7('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te 'di ni de'i mthu yind te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
29b8('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der bcom ldan 'das
30a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
30a2('bum): chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu
30a3('bum): thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der
30a4('bum): song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
30a5('bum): na pad mo la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gse ra gyi mdog can stong bskurang te/ rigs kyi bu bcom lnga na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
30a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor da cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
30a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyu ra ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom
30a8('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub
30b1('bum): sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas shar lho'i phyog
30b2('bum): mchis kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
30b3('bum): dang / rgya nad dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rtsul
30b4('bum): 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der
30b5('bum): dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs kacig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa'
30b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam
30b7('bum): ba'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la spun gyi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nas/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri sa
30b8('bum): pad mo ka ser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom
31a1('bum): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas
31a2('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//
31a3('bum): de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di
31a4('bum): nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstand pa de sem sa can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
31a5('bum): gyurd to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge
31a6('bum): ba'i tsha bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so//
31a7('bum): mchod pa byas so// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba
31a8('bum): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
31b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid yang dag par stodad pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab
31b2('bum): tu sdang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
31b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
31b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od che nang po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa
31b5('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra 'dis bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
31b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka'
31b7('bum): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byed sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de
31b8('bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'pho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
32a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yi nad te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
32a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sdang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der
32a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
32a4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
32a5('bum): thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal
32a6('bum): pa'/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
32a7('bum): rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can
32a8('bum): stong bsku ra te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor da cig/ rigs
32b1('bum): kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis
32b2('bum): der nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
32b3('bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mngapa la song dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i
32b4('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'gro gas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
32b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang
32b6('bum): rgya nad dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu rung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul
32b7('bum): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
32b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nya ma rab tu snang
33a1('bum): bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam
33a2('bum): pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo
33a3('bum): gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal
33a4('bum): gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas
33a5('bum): pad mo de dag bzhes nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
33a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
33a7('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
33a8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs
33b1('bum): su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so/
33b2('bum): bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa ku nad kyi pha rol na
33b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/
33b4('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub
33b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher ka yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas
33b6('bum): cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa gang ra ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
33b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang
33b8('bum): rog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyed/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dam
34a1('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ran cen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// rigs kyi bu 'di
34a2('bum): ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'
34a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
34a4('bum): ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yind te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra ni cen ma chog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
34a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom
34a6('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs
34a7('bum): dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
34a8('bum): la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na
34b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
34b2('bum): chen po rin chen mchog la pad mo rin po che lnga tshogs kyi sku las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can song bsgyur du te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
34b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya grub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bkra yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes ni
34b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur tar/ de nas bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na chen mchog gis
34b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
34b6('bum): grangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / bre'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyi snang bar
34b7('bum): gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'pho sbyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug
34b8('bum): pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgya dang dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / bu chung ngu bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing
35a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag/
35a2('bum): kye thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
35a3('bum): dpa' chen po rin cen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa
35a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchi sa sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dra ste/ pad mo
35a5('bum): gser gyi mdog can mdapa ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas
35a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas/ pad mo de dag bzhi
35a7('bum): nas/ nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor da to//
35a8('bum): de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind
35b1('bum): pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur
35b2('bum): tol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i za bas/ bcom ldan
35b3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so//
35b4('bum): de nas 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kund kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
35b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo 'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
35b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas
35b7('bum): snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
35b8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gso
36a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad
36a2('bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam
36a3('bum): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nu/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de
36a4('bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'a/ cho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
36a5('bum): chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yind te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas
36a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed
36a7('bum): der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
36a8('bum): dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la/
36b1('bum): dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi
36b2('bum): khams myi mjed der song shig// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la
36b3('bum): pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa
36b4('bum): de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor da cig/ rigs kyi bu sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub
36b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur da ta ra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas
36b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te
36b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag thig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas
36b8('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
37a1('bum): na bza' dang / rgya nad dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
37a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/
37a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ ba
37a4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom lnga/ na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal/ bcom ldan
37a5('bum): 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am gnod pa ma mchis sa ma zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo
37a6('bum): gser gyi mdag can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 'gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das
37a7('bum): la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi
37a8('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor da to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig
37b1('bum): rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/
37b2('bum): chos bstand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37b3('bum): chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i che bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
37b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la ri ma gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du bya sa so// mchod pa byas so// de nas steng gi phyogs
37b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdangs dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
37b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' bo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
37b7('bum): 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' bas byind pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de
37b8('bum): dang / mcher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka'
38a1('bum): ba'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' ba'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol da to
38a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
38a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byind pa la 'di skad ces bka'
38a4('bum): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rte na gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
38a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
38a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te 'di ni de'i mthu yind te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byind pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
38a7('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
38a8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kund kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur
38b1('bum): pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
38b2('bum): pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
38b3('bum): sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dab kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' bas byi nad pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bsku ra te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
38b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kakya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci
38b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi sa der nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
38b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po dka' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa
38b7('bum): de dag blangs te// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ steng/
38b8('bum): ki phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang
39a1('bum): gzunas dang / rgyam macan dang / ba dang dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bzhir bya ba dang / mu rung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i chu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems
39a2('bum): dpa'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
39a3('bum): phyag 'tshal da te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byind pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
39a4('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'ad sa la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam
39a5('bum): zo ba dog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes/ par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can ma/ dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das
39a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
39a7('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
39a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
39b1('bum): bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos stand pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
39b2('bum): tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
39b3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// mu dungad du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig
39b4('bum): yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten da kyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas paragyur te/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang
39b5('bum): dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po kun nas bres pa dang / sdod sna tshogs nas bdug spos sna tshogs 'thul ba dang / dpag bsam gyi ni ngargyan dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis yal ka'i rtse mo g.yur
39b6('bum): za ba me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / phreng ba'i shing dang / phye ma'i gang dang / bdug spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyand pa kun nas gnas par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
39b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad/ 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyu da pa 'dug pa dang / 'i bu blo ma gdang tu btan
39b8('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen po dag 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can bzhin du gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las
39b9('bum): gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
40a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa'o// // de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang
40a2('bum): bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa mang po 'tshogs pa dang
40a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyurd pa mang po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa
40a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
40a5('bum): tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces/ gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
40a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bgyi// de skad ces gsol
40a7('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa myed pa'i tshul
40a8('bum): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang yongs su lend pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su gtang ba myed pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind
40b1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lung ba dang myi ltung ba bya ba myed pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa myed pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
40b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyam pa myed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa myed cing yongs su rtog pa myed
40b3('bum): pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
40b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar
40b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ yang dag
40b6('bum): par spong ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
40b7('bum): tel/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
40b8('bum): pa la gnas te/ dbang po mya dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
41a1('bum): gnas te/ stobs myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
41a2('bum): pa la gnas te/ byang chub kyi yan lag myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
41a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lam myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41a4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i
41a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ mtshan ma myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
41a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ smond pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ smon pa myed
41a7('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
41a8('bum): bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ tshad myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
41b1('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ gzugs myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/
41b2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par
41b3('bum): tha ra pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/
41b4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ mtharakyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzo gas par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
41b5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
41b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
41b7('bum): rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gnas te/ 'bru can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
41b8('bum): 'bru can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par nags pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
42a1('bum): rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par dmar ba
42a2('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam
42a3('bum): par sngos pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
42a4('bum): te'/ rnam par zos pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam/ par zos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
42a5('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par 'thor ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du she/ sa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
42a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rus pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rus pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
42a7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par tshig pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
42a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ myi 'thun pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ zas la myi 'thun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
42b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
42b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ chos myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
42b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dge 'dun myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang
42b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims kyi dmigs pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti
42b5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gtong ba rtsigs pa'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom pa
42b6('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lha myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
42b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbugs phyi nang du grub kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dbugs kyi nang du chub rjes su
42b8('bum): dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ slob gyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ spo ba rjem
43a1('bum): dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'chi ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 'chi ba rjes su
43a2('bum): dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lus myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran
43a3('bum): ba bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ myi rtag pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ myi rtag pa'i 'du
43a4('bum): shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sdug bsngal myi dmyigs
43a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya/ 'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 'a chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te
43a6('bum): bdag myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ bdag myed pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te
43a7('bum): myi sdug pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ myi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/
43a8('bum): ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dga' ba myil
43b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten thams cad la dga' bar myi bya ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/
43b2('bum): yid brtan du myi rung ba'i gyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yid brtan du myi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
43b3('bum): la gnas te/ sdug bsngal myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags
43b4('bum): te2/ kun 'byung ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ kun 'byung ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
43b5('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa la gnas te/ 'gog pa myi dmyigs daraphyir/ 'gog pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
43b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lam myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ lam shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
43b7('bum): rgya mi ni pa la gnas te/ da pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyi/ mang bshes pa bsgom par bya'o// kAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi pa
43b8('bum): la gnas te/ myi skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ myi skye ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
44a1('bum): chos kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chos shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gnas te/ gnyis su
44a2('bum): myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ gnyis su myed pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ kun rdzob
44a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'dris pa myi dmyigs
44a4('bum): pa'i phyir/ 'dris pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sma ji
44a5('bum): bzhin myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa bsgom bar bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
44a6('bum): gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
44a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing / rnam par dpyod pa tsam myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing
44a8('bum): rnam par dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa
44b1('bum): myed cing / rnam par dpyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
44b2('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po yongs
44b3('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ kun shes pa'i dbang
44b4('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa rig
44b5('bum): pa'i dbang po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
44b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ zild kyis gnond pa'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
44b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ chub pa'i skye mched myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ chub pa'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
44b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dngos po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su rdzogs
45a1('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par dgod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
45a2('bum): rnam par dgod pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
45a3('bum): sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ spyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ spyod pa
45a4('bum): bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ bzod pa'i phyi dmyig
45a5('bum): phyir/ bzod pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lhag
45a6('bum): pa'i bsam pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
45a7('bum): la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyend par ye shes kyi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ thams cad ma khyen pa'i mi shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
45a8('bum): pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
45b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rig pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra
45b2('bum): d+hU ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
45b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ myi 'jigs pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ myi
45b4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ ma'
45b5('bum): nyams pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ ma nyams pa'i mngon bar shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sharadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
45b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
45b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ nor myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ nor bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
45b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
46a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can gyi gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi gnas dgu
46a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
46a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
46a4('bum): ma 'dres pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
46a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ byams pa chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
46a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ snying rje chen po mya dmyigs pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
46a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dga' ba chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dka' ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
46a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ btang snyoms chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ btang snyoms chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
46b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o//
46b2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid
46b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang
46b4('bum): shes pa'i rnam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// bka
46b5('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ste/
46b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug par 'dod pa'i
46b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
46b8('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
47a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47a2('bum): phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa drug la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// seMs
47a3('bum): can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang /
47a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zil dkyis kan nang par/ 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o//
47a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po thob par 'do da pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o//
47a6('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig
47a7('bum): kIs kyis dkyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu bye dad pa la bsab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rig sa pa'i
47a8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshul thams srung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zi lad kyis gnand par 'dod pa'i byang
47b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgrub par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams bzod
47b2('bum): pa bsgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zild kyis gnand par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
47b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad
47b4('bum): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zild kyis gnand par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
47b5('bum): bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba
47b6('bum): de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zild kyis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la'
47b7('bum): bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad
47b8('bum): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil kyis gan nang par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o
48a1('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang
48a2('bum): ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zild kyis mnand par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang
48a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zild kyis gnan
48a4('bum): par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi dond tu sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs
48a5('bum): mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
48a6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi dond tu tshul khrims chung ngu bsrungs kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad
48a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
48a8('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi dond tu bzod pa chung ngu bsgoms kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad
48b1('bum): myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi dond tu brtson
48b2('bum): 'grus chung ngu brtsams kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa'

48b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta buran/ tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
48b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab chung ngu bsgoms kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
48b6('bum): pa nyid du bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par
48b7('bum): bya'o// shar TIgazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar
48b8('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la spyod
49a1('bum): par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
49a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa

49a7('bum): par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ ji ltar na
49a8('bum): tshe rabs thams cad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyis bskul bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas
49b1('bum): mnyes par 'gyur/ ji ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur snyam na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

49b5('bum): thams cad du che rabs dran pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
49b6('bum): po byang chub kyi sems kyi stor pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems
49b7('bum): dpa'i spyod pa myi nyam pa thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig to'i mdza' bo dang /
49b8('bum): sdig to'i grogs po thams cad spang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen
50a1('bum): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses

50a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang
50a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la bsgribs pa myed par thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
