136b3('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi rtag
136b4('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtshan ma myed pa rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtshan ma myed
136b5('bum): pa myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// smond pa myed pa rtag tus bya bar myi sbyor ro// smond pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar
136b6('bum): myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtaka ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo nas
136b7('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
136b8('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor/
137a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po rtag
137a2('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brkyang rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi rtag
137a3('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces
137a4('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rta ga ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ce sa bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi rtag
137a5('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
137a6('bum): rang byang chub myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes nyid myi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
137a7('bum): nyid rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rtag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha ma
137a8('bum): tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs pa de'o zhes bya
137b1('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
137b2('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
137b3('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba sdug bsnga
137b4('bum): lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi
137b5('bum): sbyor ro// lus bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid bde'o zhes bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// yid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor
137b6('bum): gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sgra bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sgra sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri bde'o zhes bya bar
137b7('bum): myi sbyor ro// dri sdug bsngal mo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ reg bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg sdug bsngal
137b8('bum): lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par
138a1('bum): shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam
138a2('bum): par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngalo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo
138a3('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
138a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
138a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i
138a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg
138a7('bum): pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal
138a8('bum): lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
138b1('bum): na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
138b2('bum): bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus
138b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
138b4('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal
138b5('bum): lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chu'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor
138b6('bum): chu'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor
138b7('bum): rlung gi khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i
138b8('bum): khams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
139a1('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa sdug
139a2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye mched drug bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye
139a3('bum): mched drug sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba
139a4('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa bde'o// da zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// le nad pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
139a5('bum): lend pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// srid pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// srid pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye ba bde'o zhes bya bar myi

139a7('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi rang pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
139a8('bum): pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// brtson
139b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi
139b2('bum): sbyor ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug bsngal
139b3('bum): lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nang stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa
139b4('bum): nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang ste/ dang pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang stong pa nyi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid stong
139b5('bum): pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po/ nga ba nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po stong pa nyid
139b6('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde'o
139b7('bum): zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde 'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo
139b8('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed
140a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
140a2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos thams cad
140a3('bum): stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
140a4('bum): sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa sto/ pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa stong dpa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos
140a5('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngo sa po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor rongo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ngo bo
140a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor
140a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
140a8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
140b1('bum): dbang po rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar/
140b2('bum): myi sbyor ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde'o zhes bya bar
140b3('bum): myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug
140b4('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams pare'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams sdug pasngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams bdem
140b5('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzug
140b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par thard pa brgyad bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par thard pa brgyad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
140b7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid bde'o zhes
140b8('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtshan ma myed pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtshan ma myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// smond pa myed
141a1('bum): pa bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// smond pa myed pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams sdug
141a2('bum): bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/

141a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
141a6('bum): snying rje chen po bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi
141a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar gyi
141a8('bum): sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bde'o zhes bya bar
141b1('bum): kyi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// rang byang chub
141b2('bum): bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya
141b3('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
141b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// shar da dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
141b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba bdag ces bya bar

141b7('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig bdag
141b8('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce bdag
142a1('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus bdag myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/

147b4('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar myi skyo ra ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
147b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong panyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po ra pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po stong pa nyid ma
147b6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus byas
147b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes
147b8('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes
148a1('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
148a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
148a3('bum): nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
148a4('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dang sa po myed pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa
148a5('bum): nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dran
148a6('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams
148a7('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po
148a8('bum): rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byang
148b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
148b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams ma zhi
148b3('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
148b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar myi
148b5('bum): sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa da ku zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
148b6('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa ma
148b7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge
148b8('bum): 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi
149a1('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs papa zhi zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor
149a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po zha zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar
149a3('bum): myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
149a4('bum): pa bcwo brgyad ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nang tu zhu gas pa'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyu nad tu zhu gas pa'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// land
149a5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir
149a6('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang
149a7('bum): byang chub ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zhi zhes bya
149a8('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
149b1('bum): pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar
149b2('bum): kyi sbyor ro// tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi sbyong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/

149b4('bum): sna stong zhes bya ba'am myi skyong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna snang zhes bya ba'am mya sbyang zhes bya bar bya sbyar ra/ stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus
149b5('bum): stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// da stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs stong zhes bya ba'i myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
149b6('bum): smra stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg stong zhes bya ba'am
149b7('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par shes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong
149b8('bum): zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor
150a1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te
150a2('bum): reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi

150a4('bum): ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya ba myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
150a5('bum): tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
150a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend

150a8('bum): mye'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma' khams stong zhes bya ba'am mya stong zhes bya bar mya sbyar
150b1('bum): rlung ka khams sbyang zhes bya ba'am ma sbyang zhes bya ba'ar mya sbyar ra/ nam mkha'i khams song zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am gyi stong

150b6('bum): ba'am gyi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba'am gyi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar
150b7('bum): ra ro// mang ba ba sod byin pabyung nas bya ba 'am kyig shes bya bar bya / na grus la 'i ma sa cad dupa ma mas bya ba ma gyi myong zhes bya bar bya snar mas
150b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am
151a1('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid stong pa
151a2('bum): nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//

151b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par thard pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba'i ma myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthard kyis gnas
151b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa stong zhes bya ba
151b6('bum): 'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
151b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya
151b8('bum): ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
152a1('bum): snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// thams cad shes pa nyid stong /
152a2('bum): zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am myi stong zhes bya bar
152a3('bum): myi sbyor ro// ga ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o//
152a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po dgu pa // / sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
152a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma
152a6('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par
152a7('bum): shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro / rna ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshad
152b1('bum): ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sus mtshan ma yod ces bya
152b2('bum): ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
152b3('bum): smra mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya
152b4('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// reg mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig
152b5('bum): ki rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma tshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
152b6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam
152b7('bum): par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus
152b8('bum): reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan
153a1('bum): ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod
153a2('bum): ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtshan ma
153a3('bum): yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg
153a4('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am ma tshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan
153a5('bum): ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
153a6('bum): rkye nad kyis tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chu'i khams mtshan ma
153a7('bum): yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya
153a8('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
153b1('bum): ma rig pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'i
153b2('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye mched drug mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
153b3('bum): reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma
153b4('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lend pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// srid pa ma tshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
153b5('bum): skye ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rga shi mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma/ myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
153b6('bum): phyi nad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// bzod
153b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
153b8('bum): myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am
154a1('bum): mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// / nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed
154a2('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
154a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi'i sbyor ro// 'dus byas stong
154a4('bum): pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
154a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'i ma mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan
154a6('bum): ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya
154a7('bum): bar gyi sbyor ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya ba
154a8('bum): myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi
154b1('bum): sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
154b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed par myi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul
154b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams mtshan
154b4('bum): ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam
154b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtsha na ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i ba den pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma
154b6('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces
154b7('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
154b8('bum): 'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par thar
155a1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya/
155a2('bum): ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan
155a3('bum): ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
155a4('bum): 'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang da ga par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ ma tshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po
155a5('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi
155a6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
155a7('bum): lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am/ mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
155a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
155b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed
155b2('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes
155b3('bum): pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon
155b4('bum): pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna smond pa yod ces bya ba 'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce smond pa yo da ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
155b5('bum): lus smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid smon pa yod ces bya ba'amasmon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs smon
155b6('bum): pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sgra smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dra smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
155b7('bum): ro smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi
155b8('bum): sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
156a1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
156a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig
156a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus
156a4('bum): te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus
156a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smonang pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi'i

156a7('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba smon pa

156b6('bum): mched drug smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed

157a6('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chen po stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces
157a7('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid spo rang ba yod ces bya ba'am smonang pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smonang pa myed ces bya bar myi

157b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi'i
157b3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'amasmond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong
157b4('bum): pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'amasmon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/

157b8('bum): ces bya ba'amasmond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams smond pa yod ces
158a1('bum): bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
158a2('bum): smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par ba rang pa brgyad smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
158a3('bum): 'jug pa dgu smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa
158a4('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyar ting nge 'dzin rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa
158a5('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams smonapa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba
158a6('bum): 'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smonang pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smond pa yod ces bya ba'am
158a7('bum): skrod pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyong // byams pa chen po stonang pa yod ces bya ba'am / blo nga ba myed ces bya bar gyi gyur ro/ snying rjechen po smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smonang pa myed ces bya ba gyi
158a8('bum): sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu smonang pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smo dpa
158b1('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed
158b2('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub smon pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
158b3('bum): lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smond pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid smond pa yod ces bya ba'am/ smon pa myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
158b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta ra gyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
158b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar
158b6('bum): myi sbyor ro// 'du shes skye zhes bya ba'am 'akag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
158b7('bum): myig skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces
158b8('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
159a1('bum): sgra skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg skye zhes bya ba'am
159a2('bum): 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
159a3('bum): skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
159a4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg
159a5('bum): pa skye zhes bya ba'am/ 'gag ces bya ba ra myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'
159a6('bum): skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
159a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
159a8('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor/
159b1('bum): ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am
159b2('bum): 'akag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams skye zhes bya ba'am 'akag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chu'i khams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gog ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag
159b3('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams skye zhes bya
159b4('bum): ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa skye zhe sa bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par
159b5('bum): shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi spro ra ro// skye mched drug skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya
159b6('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// reg pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
159b7('bum): lend pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// srid pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye ba skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgashi skye zhes
159b8('bum): bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces
160a1('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa smre zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi
160a2('bum): sbyor ro/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirid pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dang po
160a3('bum): pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong
160a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi skyo ra ro// chen po stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am
160a5('bum): 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi
160a6('bum): sbyor ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dor ba myed pa
160a7('bum): stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya
160a8('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa
160b1('bum): stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces
160b2('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul
160b3('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
160b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'akag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
160b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ce sa bya bar myi sbyor ro// bsam gtan rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams
160b6('bum): skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag
160b7('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang
160b8('bum): smond pa myed pa skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag
161a1('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/
161a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag
161a3('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
161a4('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi
161a5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi skyo ra ro// dgra bcom pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag
161a6('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid skye zhes bya ba'am 'gag ces bya bar myi sbyor ro//
161a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya
161b1('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro
161b2('bum): 'du shes ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du shes da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
161b3('bum): byed da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar
161b4('bum): myi sbyor ro// myig 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig da ltar bya nga ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba 'das pa zhes bya bar
161b5('bum): myi sbyor ro// na ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// snga ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi
161b6('bum): sbyor ro// sna da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lde ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus 'das
161b7('bum): po zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar
161b8('bum): myi sbyor ro// yid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya
162a1('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// smra 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// smra ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sma da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri ma
162a2('bum): 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dri da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ro da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
162a3('bum): reg 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chos ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar
162a4('bum): myi sbyor ro// chos da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// / myig gi rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dmyig gi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
162a5('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
162a6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i
162a7('bum): rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes par
162a8('bum): ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa da ltar
162b1('bum): byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba
162b2('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes
162b3('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor
162b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
162b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
162b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ yid kyi 'dus
162b7('bum): te reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg
162b8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba da ltar byung
163a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor
163a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
163a3('bum): ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor
163a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis cho ra ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus
163a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi skyer ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg
163a6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ma 'ongs pa
163a7('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sa'i khams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi
163a8('bum): sbyor ro// ma'i khams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chu'i khams 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// chu'i khams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// chu'i khams da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba
163b1('bum): myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mye'i khams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams 'das pa zhes bya bar
163b2('bum): gyi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rlung gi khams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams
163b3('bum): ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nam mkha'i khams da ltar blang ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma 'ongs
163b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ rnam par shes pa'i kham/ sa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa ma 'ongs
163b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// ma rig pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'du byed ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro
163b6('bum): 'du byed da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya
163b7('bum): bar gyi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyar ro// mying dang gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// mying dang gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye
163b8('bum): mched drug 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// skye mched drug ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// skye mched drug da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// reg pa 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor
164a1('bum): len pas ras pazhes bya bar gyi gyur ro/ reg pa daskar thung ba zhes bya bar gyi gyu ro// tshor ba 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro/ tshom pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro/
164a2('bum): ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lend pa 'das pa zhes bya
164a3('bum): bar myi sbyor ro// lend pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lend pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sred pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// srid pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/
164a4('bum): srid pa de ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye ba 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye ba ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// skye ba da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
164a5('bum): gshi 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rga shi mi 'ongs pa zhes/ bya bar myi sbyor ro// shi de ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi smra ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'das pa zhes
164a6('bum): bya bar gyi sbyor ro/ sbyin pa'i pha yang du phyind pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'das
164a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i pha rom
164a8('bum): su byin pa 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i ma ro la tu phyi ni gam 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyiring pa dgar byung ba zhes bya bar gyi gyur ro// brtsod
164b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'das pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro/ brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ltar byung ba zhes bya bar

164b3('bum): pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// shes rab kyi
164b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nang stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// nang stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro

166a8('bum): pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar gyi sbyar ro// gzugs myod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs pa

169b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// yang dag
169b8('bum): par spong ba rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dbang po rnams brtan zhes bya ba
170a1('bum): 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stobs rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar
170a2('bum): myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
170a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// tshad myed pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
170a4('bum): brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
170a5('bum): pa dgu brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyorastong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi skyo ra ro// mtshan ma myed pa brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan
170a6('bum): zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// smond pa myed pa brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnam sa brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro//
170a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu brtan
170a8('bum): zhes bya ba/ pi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// myi 'jigs pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar
170b1('bum): myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgya
170b2('bum): brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu btan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya
170b3('bum): ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu btan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro
170b4('bum): rang byang chub brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar gyi sbyor ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams
170b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi
170b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o//
170b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa song phrag brgyab bam po bcu pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chu
170b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe gzugs yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces
171a1('bum): bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'du shes yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'du byed yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam par shes
171a2('bum): pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// snal
171a3('bum): yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid yod
171a4('bum): ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// gzugs yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sgra yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
171a5('bum): myi 'byed do// dri yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ro yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// reg yod ces bya ba'am myed
171a6('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chos yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do//
171a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa
171a8('bum): yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am
171b1('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi
171b2('bum): 'byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus kyi 'dus te
171b3('bum): reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
171b4('bum): yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sna'i 'dus
171b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am/ myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am/ myed ces
171b6('bum): bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am myed
171b7('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sa'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chu'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mye'i khas
171b8('bum): yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rlung gi khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// nam mkha'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor gyi
172a1('bum): 'byed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ma rig pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'du byed yod
172a2('bum): ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mying dang gzugs yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do//
172a3('bum): skye mched drug yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/
172a4('bum): sred pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do lend pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed srid pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do
172a5('bum): skye ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rga shi yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces
172a6('bum): bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi
172a7('bum): sbyor myi 'byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi
172a8('bum): sbyor gyi 'byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar gyi sbyor myi 'byed do/
172b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed
172b2('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'dus
172b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya/
172b4('bum): ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi skyo ra myi 'byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba
172b5('bum): 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dar ba myang pa stang ba nyid yang ces bya ba'am myang ces bya bar mya sbyar rgya'abyang nga/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed
172b6('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi
172b7('bum): 'byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ngo bo nyid
172b8('bum): stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
173a1('bum): rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod
173a2('bum): ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dbang po rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// stobs rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/
173a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'phags
173a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// bsam gtan rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshad myed pa
173a5('bum): rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do'o/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yo/ da ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/
173a6('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do//
173a7('bum): rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba'am myed

175b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod do// de bzhin nyid kyi dond du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do/
175b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi dond tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
175b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni/ chos gang la yang tha dad pa'am/ bye brag gam khyad par du lta ba myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod
175b4('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// de lha'i myig gi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi gyod do// lha'i rna ba'i dond tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
175b5('bum): byind pa la myi spyod ngo // gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
175b6('bum): la myi khyod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la myi spyod do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
175b7('bum): 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rolang su phyi na pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su phyi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' sakyi sbro'i te/ rnam pa thams
