175b8('bum): cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmyigs pa lta ga las 'ong // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bzod
176a1('bum): zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
176a2('bum): la gnas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o/
176a3('bum): phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
176a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad dal rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul
176a5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rte na gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams
176a6('bum): cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// bu dung du bya'o// mchod pa bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
176a7('bum): kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dkan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du rtsi
176a8('bum): semam mo// bdag gis chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dgas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
176b1('bum): gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// pu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/
176b2('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu
176b3('bum): dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
176b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so//
176b5('bum): bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nuH/ byad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
176b6('bum): gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te
176b7('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// bu rung
176b8('bum): du bya'o/ mchod par bya'o snyam du gyi sems so// bdag gis chu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
177a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// de 'di ltar sangs
177a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang ci stond pa/ de dag thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyand par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o//
177a3('bum): de dag gi sngon gi gnas bdag gis rjes su dran par bya'o// lha'i myig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang skyes par gyurd pa rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o// sems can
177a4('bum): grangs myed tshad myed pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan la sa bzla bar bya'o snyam du myi sems te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod
177a5('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
177a6('bum): bdud grags tshol zhing nyams spyod pa rnams kyis kyang grags myi rnyed do// 'jig rtend pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lhund kyis grub pa dang
177a7('bum): yongs su brtag pa myed par 'thun par 'grub bo// 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsalang bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
177a8('bum): gang na'i gling gi khyi ma med dgar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gapa'i snyid 'azhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'i de la nyan thos kyis ma mas
177b1('bum): kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum nu ma gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
177b2('bum): byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang /
177b3('bum): dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nad tu mthong ba dang
177b4('bum): gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar cha dbyed par gyu ra tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/
177b5('bum): de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
177b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
177b7('bum): 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal
177b8('bum): po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu pa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang
178a1('bum): tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung sdang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang
178a2('bum): tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nad tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang
178a3('bum): 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod
178a4('bum): pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad
178a5('bum): la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag
178a6('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu phra gsum gyi
178a7('bum): lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dka' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lnga nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang
178a8('bum): tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / cung spang dang / chad byed snang ba dang / ku snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / me ba dang / chung che dang /
178b1('bum): myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nang tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig
178b2('bum): bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyonang du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro//
178b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
178b4('bum): dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong
178b5('bum): ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / ma/ tshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
178b6('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha na mas dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'ar dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang
178b7('bum): tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / rje ba dang / rlung me dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / byi che ba dang /
178b8('bum): myi gdung ba dang / shi nang tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su
179a1('bum): bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyond tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la/ thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
179a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang shard kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed
179a3('bum): dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs
179a4('bum): su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dag da' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
179a5('bum): byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tsha sa chen dang / sdang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshang
179a6('bum): myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dag dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung ma dang / mad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
179a7('bum): ba dang / kyi gdung ba dang / shining tu mthong ba dang / kye nos spang ba dang / 'og sbyin kyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chang byed par gyur tu 'od blo
179a8('bum): yongs su bskyang ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub
179b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas/
179b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do//
179b3('bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs
179b4('bum): lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang dasnang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun sna nga dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed
179b5('bum): dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shi nad tu mthong ba dang / gya nom
179b6('bum): snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyo nad tu bya
179b7('bum): pa kang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can
179b8('bum): thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed bzhugs pa
180a1('bum): de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
180a2('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang
180a3('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang pa dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang
180a4('bum): che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lbal
180a5('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyond tu bya ba
180a6('bum): gang ji srid cig yod pa de dag kyang che 'di nyid la/ thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dri stor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can
180a7('bum): thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kang ji snyed
180a8('bum): bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
180b1('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dka' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs
180b2('bum): pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas da nga / che ba dang /
180b3('bum): chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b4('bum): dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyu rang tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la
180b5('bum): thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par
180b6('bum): byed pa'i phyir ro// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b7('bum): dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser lung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshel
180b8('bum): ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /
181a1('bum): snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang /
181a2('bum): 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shind tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad
181a3('bum): byed par gyu rab tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
181a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
181a5('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a ngas gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa'am
181a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang
181a7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung sdang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang
181a8('bum): kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang
181b1('bum): shinang tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do//
181b2('bum): de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181b3('bum): po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya/
181b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo dang / spobs pa
181b5('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs myi che bar mngon tu 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
181b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang
181b7('bum): nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa ni 'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang /
181b8('bum): 'du ba'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'thang pa'am/ myi 'phrang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba'am
182a1('bum): 'bral ba'am/ 'phrad pa'am/ myi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes
182a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis
182a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram 'o nad tam myi 'gyur zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa myed do//
182a4('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya ba myed do// mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
182a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
182a6('bum): chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
182a7('bum): brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba myi
182a8('bum): byed de sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
182b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ 'o nad tam khong du chud par myi 'gyur zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de ni/
182b2('bum): 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba myed do// de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes par myi sbyor/ myi stong zhes
182b3('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
182b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du/ myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang gzugs su myi sbyor ro// tshor ba
182b5('bum): dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang tshor bar myi sbyor ro/ 'du shes dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su myi sbyor ro// 'du byed dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor
182b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par myi sbyor ro// myig dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig
182b7('bum): du myi sbyor ro// rna ba dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dngan par myi sbyor ro// sna dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sngar myi sbyor ro// lce dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor
182b8('bum): pa nyid dang khyer myi sbyor ro// lus dang stong pa nyid du kyi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su myi sbyor ro/ yid dang stong pa nyid du kyi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid du kyi sbyor ro// gzugs dang stong
183a1('bum): pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su myi sbyor ro// sgra dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang slar myi sbyor ro// dri dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang drir myi sbyor ro//
183a2('bum): ro dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang ror myi sbyor ro// reg dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg du myi sbyor ro// chos dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su myi sbyor ro//
183a3('bum): myig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig gi khams su myi sbyor ro// gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// myig
183a4('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi skye rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang na
183a5('bum): ba'i khams su myi sbyor ro// smra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su myi sbyoro/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor
183a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang na ba'i rnas par shes pa'i khams su rgya sbyor ra// / sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su kyi sbyor ro// dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor
183a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang dra'o khams su myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ lce'i khams dang nga
183a8('bum): pa nyid du kyi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su myi sbyor ro// ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ro'i khams su myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
183b1('bum): dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ sa #/ sa seM/ sa byamananas rgyas la kyi mas rgya /
183b2('bum): khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg bya'i khams su myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
183b3('bum): su myi sbyor ro// yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su myi sbyor ro
183b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi skyo/ ra ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste
183b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni/ rnal 'byor dam pa ste sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
183b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar myi srung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyind par byed do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
183b7('bum): du yang myu rang tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya/ mchog ces
183b8('bum): byadam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya ba/ gtso bo zhes bya ba gya nom pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor 'di na
184a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnal 'byor da te/ bla na myed pa'i rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
184a2('bum): dpa' chen po na lung bstand pa zhes bya ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyurd pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a3('bum): po na sems can tshad myed/ grangs myed pa'i don byed kyang de 'di snyam du bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson pa yin no zhe'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar myi sems
184a4('bum): sol// bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung stond pa mdzad do// bdag ni lung bstand pa nye bar gyur to// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
184a5('bum): sbyang bar bya'o// bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smyind par bya'o// bdag gis ni bla na myed pa ya bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/
184a6('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa myed de/ de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi
184a7('bum): pha rol tu phyi rid pa la spyod pa'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstand par bya ba'am/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang
184a8('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
184b1('bum): sems can gyi 'du shes myi skye'o// bdag gi 'du shes myi skye'o// srog gi 'du shes myi skye'o// 'gro ba'i 'du shes myi skye'o// gso' ba'i 'du shes myi skye'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes myi skye'o// gang zag
184b2('bum): gi 'du shes myi skye'o// shed can gyi 'du shes myi skye'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes myi skye'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes myi skye'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes myi skye'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes myi skye'o
184b3('bum): mthong ba po'i 'du shes myi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shi nang tu skye ba myed cing / 'gag pa myed pa'i phyi rad te/ sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa myed do//
184b4('bum): gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa myed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par yang ci ltar 'gyur da te/ sha ra dA ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
184b5('bum): chen po na sems can skye ba myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
184b6('bum): yin/ sems can gyi dmyigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa yin/ sems can rang bzhin
184b7('bum): myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can ngo bo nyid myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin te// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub seMs
184b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
185a1('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor da te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zild kyis mnand te gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
185a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
185a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par sgrub bo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni/ ser sna'i sems myi skyed do//
185a4('bum): tshul khrims nganang pa'i sems dang / gnod par sem sa pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems myi skyed
185a5('bum): de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bus pa com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
185a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de/ gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
185a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos
185a8('bum): te 'dir skyes pa'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ros dang mya'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas
185b1('bum): kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/ tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang / chos zab mo 'di dag
185b2('bum): de la mngon tu 'gyur ro// de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ka na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par la
185b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur
185b4('bum): byed par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis
185b5('bum): thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug la nyam pa myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa myed do// sha ra dwa
185b6('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas myi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
185b7('bum): dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yind te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myu ra tu mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no// de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge
185b8('bum): 'dzind kyi sgo rnams kyang myu rang tu mngon tu myi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu kang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor
186a1('bum): 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
186a2('bum): shi 'phos nas gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der 'gro ste/ nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
186a3('bum): rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la myi mkhas pa dag bsam gtan
186a4('bum): dang po la yang mnyam par gzhog bsam gtan gnyi sa pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan gsuM pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnya
186a5('bum): bar gzhog cing pha rol tu phyind pa drug la yang gyod de de dag pas gtad thob pas lha tshe rings po'i nang du skyes shing / gal te myi'i nang du skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
186a6('bum): 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po rno ba yang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang sa dpa' chen po bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la shes
186a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la myi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams spangs nas/ phyir 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye ba yang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
186a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yi nad te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang smos
186b1('bum): par 'jugabasam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang stos/
186b2('bum): par 'jug snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug dka' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug
186b3('bum): nam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dram
186b4('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jugayang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug dbang po
186b5('bum): lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug/ stobs lnga la yang snyomasapar 'jug/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
186b6('bum): la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi dbang gyis myi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par
186b7('bum): s+yod pa dbang gis kyi sbyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang kyis kyi skye ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ga na bzhugs shing 'tsho spong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yang
186b8('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
187a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang
187a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/
187a3('bum): btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad myed pa'i
187a4('bum): skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge
187a5('bum): 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis myi skye'o// de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs che/ zhing mtho' ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i
187a6('bum): rigs su skye'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/ de yang srid pa la rkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can mo ngas su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar
187a7('bum): yang bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang
187a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam
187b1('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug 'du shes myed 'du shes/
187b2('bum): myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang kyis myi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal po
187b3('bum): chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// sum cu cha gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// dka' ldan gyi wa
187b4('bum): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lhan mas dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag na
187b5('bum): gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byed do sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do//
187b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug
187b7('bum): gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jugabasam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug
187b8('bum): snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug dka' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug rnam shes/
188a1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/
188a2('bum): de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul
188a3('bum): du bya bar 'gyu rang te/ de dag de na 'khod cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de
188a4('bum): lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhi nga 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo
188a5('bum): bskor ba'i dond tu gsol pa gdab par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol da tu
188a6('bum): phyi na pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug
188a7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jugadaka' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyos
188a8('bum): par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jugacung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par
188b1('bum): 'juga'adu shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang yongs su sgom yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang yongs su sgom rdzu 'phrul
188b2('bum): kyi rkang pa bzhi yang yongs su sgom dbang po lnga yang yongs su sgom/ stobs lnga yang yongs su sgom byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
188b3('bum): pa yang yongs su sgom stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gyis myi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag
188b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon tu gyur pa rnams pasnyend bkurd cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa s+yad de dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// de dag
188b5('bum): der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/ dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya s+ho/ nga du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas/ 'dir skye
188b6('bum): pa bstan te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do//
188b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bcu gcig pa// / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
189a1('bum): chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang myi skye gzugs kyi khams su yang myi skye gzugs myed pa'i khams su yang myi skye bar de dag re
189a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim po dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
189a3('bum): du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par che zhing
189a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang myi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
189a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes
189a6('bum): pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu myed pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do//
189a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi smra myi klag pa dang / chos kyi snga myi
189a8('bum): grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi smra myi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi legs pa rjodachos kyi legs pa rjodadage 'dun gyi
189b1('bum): legs pa rjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag
189b2('bum): tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed par dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyi nad cad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang /
189b3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
189b4('bum): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
189b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa bcwo brgyad kyang thob nas de dag nam yang 'dod
189b6('bum): pa'i khams su yang myi skyegazugs kyi khams su yang myi skye gzugs myed pa'i khams su yang myi skye zhing de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
189b7('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i
189b8('bum): sa 'thob pa yang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
190a1('bum): par 'tshang rgya zhing mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs myed/ tshad myed pa'i don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
190a2('bum): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am bskal da pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa
190a3('bum): ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems
190a4('bum): dpe' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhand cig/ sang sa rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su
190a5('bum): sbyind par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ra bya ba'i dond tu 'dong pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
190a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang /
190a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas
190a8('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa
190b1('bum): las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go
190b2('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyos
190b3('bum): par 'jug go/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog ko/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nam mkha'
190b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog po'i snyoms par 'jug pa mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog/
190b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas
190b6('bum): 'aklog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ cung zad myed pa'i skyel
190b7('bum): mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la
190b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug go/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub
191a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par/
191a2('bum): 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnand cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa
191a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa
191a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa tshad myed pa rnams thob pa gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa rnam par tha rad pa brgyad thob pa mthar da kyis gnas
191a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa thob pa/ mngon bar shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa
191a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa myi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
191a7('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad thob pa dag rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum po thob kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ phyir myi 'ong
191a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed/ rang byang chub thob par myi byed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung
191b1('bum): bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su stond par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / la nad cig phyir
191b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/
191b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yi nad te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
191b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/ phyir myi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i
191b5('bum): bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dA ti'i
191b6('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
191b7('bum): la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob pa gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa/ mngon par
191b8('bum): shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad thob pa da//
192a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i donang du gyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs pa myi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
192a2('bum): che gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gyod pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi
192a3('bum): khams su 'dong zhing / de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
192a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bskal pa grangs myed tshad myed pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
192a5('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi dond tu rtag par batshon te nam yang gnod par
192a6('bum): 'gyur ba'i chog myi smra/ gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang yid kyi las myi byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
192a7('bum): tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing sems can gyi dond tu rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po
192a8('bum): rgyu nad gcod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lhur
192b1('bum): byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / me
192b2('bum): tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal
192b3('bum): stan dang / kos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang / 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing / 'tsho ba'i yo
192b4('bum): byang skyon myed pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing
192b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lhur byas te/ sem sa can rnams lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
192b6('bum): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba myed pa dang / gnod sas
192b7('bum): myed pa la rab tu 'ad byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug la gnas shing / bzon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
192b8('bum): pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
193a1('bum): po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams zhi gnas che gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab
193a2('bum): tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lhur byas te
193a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang / byol song kyi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i
193a4('bum): 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad la das yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos stond pa dag kyang yod do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a5('bum): dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyind pa drug la gnas shingasangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i
193a6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang
193a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i
193a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//
193b1('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing
193b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang
193b3('bum): rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar
193b4('bum): byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
193b5('bum): pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing
193b6('bum): de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang
193b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems
193b8('bum): can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan rnam
194a1('bum): par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po
194a2('bum): yongs su sgrub cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
194a3('bum): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub
194a4('bum): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/
194a5('bum): de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshel
194a6('bum): gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sme bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston
194a7('bum): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing
194a8('bum): de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang myache ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub
194b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems
194b2('bum): can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang /
194b3('bum): mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
194b4('bum): de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i
194b5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la cho sa stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bste na bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems
194b6('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par
194b7('bum): du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis sogs pa sha sa ga skye bar byed pa dag kyang yang nga/
194b8('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan
195a1('bum): cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ngag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung /
195a2('bum): de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar
195a3('bum): byed pa dag kyang yod do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos stond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen
195a4('bum): bkur byed pa dang / chos nyand cing byang chub sems dpa'i da ge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
195a5('bum): de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems
195a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa'i skye ba sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug
195a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas ste/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang
195a8('bum): bo'i dga' ba dang mos pa skyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar da kyis theg pa gsum
195b1('bum): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag
195b2('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
195b3('bum): tu phyi nang pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shi nad tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po sha nad tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag myi stod cing / gzhan myi smod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang /
195b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems paskyed byi nang chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa dang / tshul gyi mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / phyir myi ldog/
195b5('bum): pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar myi 'gyur zhing la ga par 'gro ba dang / ngan song du myi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
195b6('bum): dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyi nad chad/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam myi gtong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
195b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi
195b8('bum): lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / sbyin pa dang ngag snyand pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196a1('bum): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba
196a2('bum): rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing / de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang
196a3('bum): mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
196a4('bum): tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing sems can log par lta ba'i mund pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sna nga bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na myed pa yang
196a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang nam yang 'bral bar myi byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni
196a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
196a7('bum): tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyi go mya dbye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
196a8('bum): busabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags ngag gi
196b1('bum): las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196b2('bum): chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyis/ des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis/ des ni ngag gi las shig bsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyis/ des ni yid
196b3('bum): kyi las shig bsam snyam na/ de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
196b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pas ni/ rdzug pa dang / ka dang / yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ tshul khris
196b5('bum): nganang pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ gnod sems kyi sem sa bskyed pa'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa'am thug pa'i sems bskyed pa'am/ shes rab 'chal pa'i
196b6('bum): sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus myi dmyigs so// ngag myi dmyigs so// sems myi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
196b7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len bskyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes par myi bya ste/ de ni gnas myed pa'o//
196b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong // ngag gi
197a1('bum): gnas ngan len yongs su spyong ngo // yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba
197a2('bum): myed pa'o// ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba myed pa'o// yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba myed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas
197a3('bum): ngan len sbyong ba lags ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len spyod ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub seMs
197a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus myi dmyigs/ ngag myi dmyi gas sems myi dmyigs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas
197a5('bum): ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas len yo ngas su sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su/ spyod ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
197a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po sems bskyed phyi nad cang/ dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam// rang sangs
197a7('bum): rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa myed par de rtag tu rgyun myi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas
197a8('bum): ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
197b1('bum): pa la gyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la dpyod pa dang
197b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol pa/ bcom
197b3('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
197b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / ngag la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / yid la dmyigs pa myed pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
197b5('bum): pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus
197b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg
197b7('bum): pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
197b8('bum): la dmyigs pa myed par gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yind te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmyigs pa myed cing / blang ba myed pa dang /
198a1('bum): dor ba myed pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod cing / nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa myed
198a2('bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur pyod pa'i rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam
198a3('bum): byang chub me sa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sa nom sasas byed pa dang / so sa la rlos sems myed pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems myed pa
198a4('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig dang gzugs la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba dang / smra la rlom sems myed pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom seMs
198a5('bum): myed pa dang / lce dang ro la rlom sems myed pa dang / lu sa dang reg la rlom sems myed pa dang / yid dang chos la rlom sems myed pa dang // sa'i khams la rlom
198a6('bum): sems myed pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / mye'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems myed
198a7('bum): pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes
198a8('bum): pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med padang
198b1('bum): sna'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / ro'i khas
198b2('bum): la rlom sems myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / reg bya'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / lus
198b3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom
198b4('bum): sems myed pa dang // rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems myed pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
198b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang
198b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rlom sems myed pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid
198b7('bum): la rlom sems myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / don dam/
198b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
199a1('bum): la rlom sems myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom
199a2('bum): sems myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang /
199a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang // dran pa nye bar
199a4('bum): gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / yang dag paraspong ba bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyiH/ rapa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / dbang po lnga la
199a5('bum): rlom sems myed pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems mye da pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
199a6('bum): la rlom sems myed pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang /
199a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom
199a8('bum): sems myed pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / mtshan myed pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la
199b1('bum): rlom sems myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems myed pa dang
199b2('bum): gyi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems myed pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom sems myed par
199b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang // rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa
199b4('bum): dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems myed pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes
199b5('bum): pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa/
199b6('bum): la rlom sems myed par gyu ra pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i chu
199b7('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam
199b8('bum): yang ngan song rnams su myi skye myi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ smad par 'gyur
200a1('bum): ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind par myi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
200a2('bum): 'das de lta bu'i ye shes de dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ba dang / myi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur ba dang
200a3('bum): lus gang dang ldan pas/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes de gang lags// bcom
200a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang / ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
200a5('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyand to//
200a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lko
200a7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang
200a8('bum): nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes res bu dang ldan pas ni
200b1('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang /
200b2('bum): nyand to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni
200b3('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang
200b4('bum): nyanang to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sa sa rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de
200b5('bum): lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
200b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyand to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
200b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam
200b8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyand to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par bye ba
201a1('bum): dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/
201a2('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi
