201a3('bum): zhing yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
201a4('bum): ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed kyang mthongango chos kyang nyand to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
201a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
201a6('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyand to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge
201a7('bum): 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
201a8('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyadang to// byang chub sems dpa'i
201b1('bum): dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// chos kyi
201b2('bum): 'du shes myi skyed do// dge 'dun gyi 'du shes myi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes myi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi 'du
201b3('bum): shes kyi sbed do// bdag gi 'du shes kyi skyed do// gzhan kyi 'du shes myi srung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi 'du shes kyi spyad do// ye shes de la bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
201b4('bum): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa myi myigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
201b5('bum): myi dmyigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la snod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ brtson
201b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/
201b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs so// nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom
201b8('bum): snyel/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs so// ngan
202a1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/
202a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma
202a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so//
202a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad s+ho/ nga pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgo ma ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so//
202a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ myi dmyigs pa ste/ nga pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so
202a6('bum): ngom nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs ma dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// drang ba
202a7('bum): nye bar gzhas pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba pa'i sgom ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zan/
202a8('bum): skom ste rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs so// dbang po lnga sgom ste/ dbang po rnams kyi dmyigs so// stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams kyi dmyigs so// byang chub kyi yar
202b1('bum): lag bdun sbom ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i/
202b2('bum): bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs so gan sa kyi kyi / tshad myed pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad myed pa myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
202b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs so// rnam par thard pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thard rnams myi dmyigs so// mthar kyis
202b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams myigs so// stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid kyi
202b5('bum): dmyigs so// mtshan ma myed pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma myed pa myi dmyigs so// smon pa myed pa sgom ste/ smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa
202b6('bum): rnams sgom ste/ mngon pa shes pa rnams kyi dmyigs pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams snyom ste/ ting nge 'dzin nams myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi donams sgom te/ gzungs kyis
202b7('bum): rnams rgya myigs so// de bzhin shegs pa ma sa na nam / deb gagags rnam thapas rnams kyi gas / kyi rigs pa can pa hU~Mjigs
202b8('bum): myi dbyigs so/ ma mo yang dag par rig pa yan rlom ste/ ma mo yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs so// byams pa men la gas/ pa chedan po phyi'i phyogs so// snying chen
203a1('bum): tho skom ste/ snying rje chen po myi dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs so// rgyu nad tu zhugs
203a2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// la rang cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
203a3('bum): sgom ste/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang byang chub sgom ste/ rang byang chub myi dmyigs so// lam gyi rnam
203a4('bum): pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi myigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs so//
203a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub mes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thos
203a6('bum): cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
203a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la kyod pa'i tshe/ myig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i myig dang / lha'i phyog dang / shes rab kyi
203a8('bum): kyis dang / chos kyi gyis dang / sangs rgyas kyi myig go// gam la pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i ga'i rgyan yongs su dag pa gang lagapa
203b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu su ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
203b2('bum): dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
203b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong
203b4('bum): ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
203b5('bum): dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yo da do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba
203b6('bum): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad dgu pargya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis
203b7('bum): dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis 'jam bu ming mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203b8('bum): chen po sha'i myig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis gling gsum mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems da
204a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis stong
204a2('bum): gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
204a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig yongs
204a4('bum): su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig yodas su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das
204a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi 'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'as rab tu shes so// sum cu rtsal
204a6('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'as rab tu shes so// mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/
204a7('bum): dka' ldan gyi sa rnams sde lha'i tshig gang yin pa na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa dan/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu rna
204a8('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes ma// rangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i phyog gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
204b1('bum): dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni
204b2('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs chend kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni
204b3('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni
204b4('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sem sa dpas rab tu shes so// dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i
204b5('bum): myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad myed dge ba'i
204b6('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
204b7('bum): che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chad
204b8('bum): myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
205a1('bum): dpas rab tu shes so// myi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni
205a2('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin/
205a3('bum): ba de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang sems
205a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ri sa kyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ sum
205a5('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sa
205a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de na/ dka' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig re ni/ 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyis myi she so
205a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lde'i myig de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lce'i myig re ni/ tshangs
205a8('bum): ris kyi sa rnams kyis gyigs me/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ tshangs sanye lan gyi lha rnams kyis myigs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
205b1('bum): chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems/
205b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myika de ni/ chung snang gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so//
205b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mun rgya de'i/ tshad med snang ba'i ska rnams kyis kyishes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snyi phyog dang/ kun snang dang pa'i
205b4('bum): nams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi sa myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
205b5('bum): chen po'i lha'i myog de ni/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyis myig sa so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha 'i myig de ni/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes
205b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ che ba'i lha rnams
205b7('bum): kyim myi shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lce'i myig de ni/ chung rje'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig
205b8('bum): de ni/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems
206a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ myi che ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams
206a2('bum): kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni
206a3('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes ste// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
206a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//
206a5('bum): lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'gro
206a6('bum): dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems cad rnams kyi
206a7('bum): che'i bo dang skye bar rab tu shes so// spya gyig des bu dud ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
206a8('bum): can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig del bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poni byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
206b1('bum): kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
206b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems cad rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na
206b3('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ki bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
206b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nub byang kyi phyogs mams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed kyisems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so//
206b5('bum): lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/ khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams
206b6('bum): kyi 'chi 'pho dang sme ba rab tu shes so// lha'i m-ig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na steng gro phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed
206b7('bum): kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang sme ba rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig yongs su dag pa'o//
207a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bcu gnyis pa// / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
207a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
207a3('bum): myig gang dang ldan pas/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ myi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
207a4('bum): pa'am/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'ajig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcasapa'am/ zag pa myed pa'i chos gang yang myi shes
207a5('bum): pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi myig gang dang ldan pas chos gang yang ma mthong ba myed/ ma thos pa myed/ ma bsams pa myed/ khong du ma chud pa myed pa 'di ni
207a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos
207a7('bum): myig yongs su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myog gis gang zag 'dzi
207a8('bum): dang pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang bag 'dan chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang bag 'din spong pa nyid la gnas kyi'o/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par 'a'ang pa'i sgomang pa nyid kyi
207b1('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye
207b2('bum): shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / be tsom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kund tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'ang ni rkye nang tu zhugs pa
207b3('bum): zhes bya'o// des bsgoms pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'don la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'o// lam de nyid de bas
207b4('bum): kyang shind tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag/ 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// lam de nyid de bas kyang
207b5('bum): shi nad tu bsgoms nas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag
207b6('bum): 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo mtshan ma myed pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas des
207b7('bum): zag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma zag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bskye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/ 'jig tshogs
207b8('bum): la lwa ba dang / the tsos dang / tshul khrims dang / brgyal zhugs pasnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'din sunang tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o//
208a1('bum): des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni land cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas
208a2('bum): kyang shind tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shi nad tu bsgoms pas
208a3('bum): gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni smond pa myed pa
208a4('bum): la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam paratha rad pa'i sgo smond pa myed pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/
208a5('bum): de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang
208a6('bum): tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas
208a7('bum): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu 'asal khyod de/ gang zag 'di ni lenang cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de la ma de nyid de bas grang gi nang tu 'asgoms nas/ 'dong ba'i 'dod chags dang /
208a8('bum): gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'ad no phyir myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang gi nang tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs myed
208b1('bum): pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang /
208b2('bum): chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni/ 'gog pa'i
208b3('bum): chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas dad pa la stsogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur da te/ 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// shar
208b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po'i chos kyi myig gis byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste
208b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// bzod pa'i pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa la spyod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
208b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa lo spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan
208b7('bum): thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzind par byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i
208b8('bum): rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du
209a1('bum): skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o// dka' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o// 'phrul dka'i lha'i nang du skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// de de dag na gnas shing / seMs
209a2('bum): can rnams yongs su smyind par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs
209a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan
209a4('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang myi lung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di na/ na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
209a5('bum): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par myi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba/ ra rab tu shes ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs
209a6('bum): su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dini bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
209a7('bum): du lung bstan pan/ 'di ni lungs bstanang pa'o// 'dri na nges pa'o// 'di ni ma nges pa'o// 'don lung bsta dang par 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni lung bstanang bar myi 'gyur ba'o// 'a
209a8('bum): dag ni byo gyi ldog pa sa/ dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dgan phyir ldog pa ma yin pa ma/ dbang po ma tha'i pa'i/ 'don mngon pa rags pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'din ma tsha pa na
209b1('bum): pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ sharang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag /
209b2('bum): du song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// lho bya/
209b3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur
209b4('bum): bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// nub byo/ gas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ga tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
209b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khas
209b6('bum): gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang
209b7('bum): mchod pa byed do// bya shad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig chen gyi 'ams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu spong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
209b8('bum): nams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkrar bsti dang / bu dung dang / mchod pa byed do// gar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu songon
210a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// lkol
210a2('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim
210a3('bum): kro dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
210a4('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang mchod pa byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'ji
210a5('bum): nyid dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcu ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud
210a6('bum): dang / mchod pa byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
210a7('bum): mnyes par byed do// rim glo dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dungad dang / mchod pa byed do// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par myi 'gyur ro//
210a8('bum): 'dis ni bzod pa thob pa'o// 'dis ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'da'i mangs/
210b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
210b2('bum): ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang myi ldan pa'o// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smyind par byas so// 'dis ni seMs
210b3('bum): can yongs su smyind par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
210b4('bum): 'das rnams lags pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'di la ni legs pa brjod pa myi mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
210b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par myi 'gyur ralo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas
210b6('bum): tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun na tshad myed par 'gyur/
210b7('bum): 'dzin ched yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
210b8('bum): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba gyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gyod par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o// 'don srod
211a1('bum): pa tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni stong po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par myi
211a2('bum): 'gyur ro// 'di dag la ni yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol
211a3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMs
211a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de
211a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ rgya 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen
211a6('bum): po dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dka' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par tha rad pa bsgribs pa myed pa dang ldan
211a7('bum): ba yin/ de ni de'i myig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig de dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba'am/ ma thos pa'am/ ma shes pa'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang
211a8('bum): yang myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o//
211b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyind pa drug la brtson par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
211b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /
211b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus shes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
211b4('bum): tu phyi nad pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do// de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myig lnga bskyed pa'o// myig lnga po de dag la bslabs
211b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rold tu
211b6('bum): phyi nad pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do//
211b7('bum): de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do// gcig tu gyur da cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur da cing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do//
211b8('bum): thig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung
212a1('bum): kis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// sa la yang kye nang tu 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul pa byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang 'bying ba myed par
212a2('bum): 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// ngu bar 'phrul zhing myer 'barang te/ dper na mye'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/ 'di ltar mthu che
212a3('bum): zhing / 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang spur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
212a4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ des rdzu 'phrul gang gi sa rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu myi dmyigs ste/
212a5('bum): de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs pa ra rdzu 'phrul lam rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bas ma ba tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
212a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngond tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//
212a7('bum): de lha'i na ba'i khams rnam par dag pa kyi las 'das pas/ wA dang phyi gnyis ka'i sna bos ste/ lha'i na ba'i khams des bdag ni swA nya nad ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do//
212a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang smar dmyigs pa myed de/ de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par
212b1('bum): lha'i rna ba'i khamasu la bsam pa yang myi skyed do// de ltar na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams
212b2('bum): mdo rang tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rold kyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
212b3('bum): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/ 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang
212b4('bum): bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
212b5('bum): du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa rdzi lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang ldan
212b6('bum): ba'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti muka dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang
212b7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang bral
212b8('bum): ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa'i sems
213a1('bum): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar lend pa myed pa'i sems la nye bar lend pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
213a2('bum): shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i seMs
213a3('bum): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i
213a4('bum): sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sem sa shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
213a5('bum): tshad myed pa'i sems la tshad myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i seMs
213a6('bum): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
213a7('bum): rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam pa ma grol ba'i sems la rnam pa ma grol ba'i sems shes
213a8('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag
213b1('bum): pa myed pa'i sems la zag pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar
213b2('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na yod pa'i
213b3('bum): sems la bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na myed pa'i sems la bla na myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
213b4('bum): stel/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang myed do// de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag shes so
213b5('bum): zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// 'di ltar rang zhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
213b6('bum): sems myi dmyigs ste/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am/ sems shes par mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi
213b7('bum): skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang gyod pa mngon tu
213b8('bum): bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngond tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par smra ba ste/
214a1('bum): sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ nyi ma brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no//
214a2('bum): zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ lo brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal
214a3('bum): pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa
214a4('bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ mying ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni
214a5('bum): 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dugatshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyurd te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas ni/ che che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes
214a6('bum): bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni/ 'dir skyes mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bzlas/ kut+tan tshigs dang bcas/ ngan tags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rna
214a7('bum): pa du mAr rjes su drand te/ sngon kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di skar ye shes de ye shes ma
214a8('bum): yind te/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed de/ 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin
214b1('bum): dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i ye shes myi dmyigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i
214b2('bum): ye shes kyi don tu bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi gnas rjes
214b3('bum): su dran pa mngond tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug
214b4('bum): pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngand pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na kanas/ pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni
214b5('bum): lus kyis ngan tu gyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan yid kyis ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan ba/ 'phags pa rnams la sku rad pa 'debs pa
214b6('bum): log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs
214b7('bum): bar sdod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par stod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par sdod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la sku radapa kyi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams so/ de
214b8('bum): rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ de ltar phyogs bcu kund kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings
215a1('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes ste/ des kyang rlom
215a2('bum): sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar myig de myig ma yin zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyirade te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// de yang 'di ltar rang
215a3('bum): bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i myig de lta bu des myi dmyigs ste/ de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yid la byed
215a4('bum): pa ma gtogs par lha'i myig gis bsam pa'am/ lba'i myig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / myig mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ma na bar sgrub pa yin no// de ni zag pa zad pa mngon tu
215a6('bum): bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i yo shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis thob par myi byed do// gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i de
215a7('bum): zu chos kyang gang yang gyi mthong ngo // de mngon pa shes pa des/ drengos bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bgazugs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu stso
215a8('bum): ba byed de/ zag pa yang pa mngon su bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur babyed do// de 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin 'ang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i
215b1('bum): de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed de/ de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlob sems su 'gyur ba'i zag
215b2('bum): pa bad pa'i ye shes mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmyigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyerang pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zang pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'
215b3('bum): zag pa zad pa mngon tu bya ba'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
215b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zad pa mngond tu bya ba'i mngon par she shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
215b5('bum): phyi nad pa la de ltar spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug yo ngas su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo// sha
215b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
215b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ chags pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung ba su/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
215b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ltung ba bya ba myed pa
216a1('bum): nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
216a2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams
216a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus
216a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'ang sa pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus dang sems kyi brtson la/ khrus myi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams
216a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
216a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
216a7('bum): lam spong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la gyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
216a8('bum): pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems myi dmyigs pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam spyod pa
216b1('bum): ngag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas shing / mtha'
216b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam yongs
216b3('bum): su sbyong ba yin no// de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzind pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngand pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// bzod pa ni 'ju
216b4('bum): pa nye bar gzung ba las gdags so// brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar gzung ba las gdakas so// ting nge 'an ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar gzung ba las gdag so
216b5('bum): shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las kang gas ste/ de ni rga lang to zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ ma rgalang to zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// sbyin
216b6('bum): ba byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems byed do// sbyin pa myi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// tshul khrims ngand pa can
216b7('bum): no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya
216b8('bum): bar rlom sems myed do// le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sos
217a1('bum): myed do// shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// myos so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/
217a2('bum): phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i
217a3('bum): bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim mo byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya ba
217a4('bum): rlom sems myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltarashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rlom sems thams / da yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i
217a5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed ga yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
217a6('bum): cad la myed de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyind par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams
217a7('bum): cad mkhyedad pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rid pa la gyod pa'i sems can thams cad
217a8('bum): snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob
217b1('bum): nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do// de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byond cing dben par bya ba yind te
217b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yin/ de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang de dang de dag tu nam yang myig gis yid du
217b3('bum): myi 'ong ba'i gzugs myi mthong ngo // rna bas yid du myi 'ong ba'i sgra myi thos so// sngas yid du myi 'ong ba'i dri myi tshor ro// lces yid du myi 'ong ba'i ro myi myong ngo // lus kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i rig
217b4('bum): myi rig go/ yid kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par ri dag pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de
217b5('bum): sngar khyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong
217b6('bum): sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum
217b7('bum): ba mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka' bo stan las langs te/ bla kos zag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
217b8('bum): logs su thal mo sbyor bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni chu
218a1('bum): dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad/
218a2('bum): ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa dpe' skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
218a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi sku lang
218a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o// 'dod pa na gyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag kyang de
218a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i khyad pa gyod par 'gyur
218a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa byams des kyang / de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe/ 'khor bzhi po de dag ni
218a7('bum): 'din 'dod pazhin su garang thogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lo phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas song mthong bar gyur to/
218a8('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong par gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyu rang to//
218b1('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub byad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//
218b2('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyurd to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur
218b3('bum): mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni yod par ma mthong ngo // de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ srog chags stong phrag bcus
218b4('bum): bdag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing / de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhe/ sa smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
218b5('bum): kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga'abo stan las langs te/ bla kos phrag pa gcig la
218b6('bum): gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kang na ba de logs su thal mo sbya rad pas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
218b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang / rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis
218b8('bum): bka' stsal da pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
219a1('bum): dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
219a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya nad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rtend tu
219a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pa bshes pa'i bu gang po dang /
219a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kya kund kyis mngon par shes pa shi nang tu mang ba dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha nad tu
219a5('bum): mang ba dag dang / dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma shi nad tu mang ba dag kis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
219a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das
219a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
219a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni//
219b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa rab bo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
219b2('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa phul lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
219b3('bum): phyind pa mchog go// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gya nom pa'o//
219b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzang po'o//
219b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bla na ma mchis pa'o// /
219b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
219b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
219b8('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bcom
220a1('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// bcu
220a2('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
220a3('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nam mkha'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
220a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan
220a5('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan
220a6('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// @
220a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
220a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o//
220b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
220b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // yongs su gtong
220b3('bum): yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyu rang to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
220b4('bum): de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyurd to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang
220b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
220b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mye mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so// srung ngo // srung bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam bya dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
220b7('bum): tu byin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob pa
220b8('bum): 'gyur ro// de'i mid du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'dis me/ zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thotho par gyur to/ 'tsham mo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
221a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di la gyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so// sbom mo// sgom par
221a2('bum): 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi
221a3('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
221a4('bum): thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
221a5('bum): rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brgya mas so// chom mo// rtsom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi
221a6('bum): pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob
221a7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//
221a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la gyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do// skyed do// skyed
221b1('bum): par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
221b2('bum): de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
221b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
221b4('bum): po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms so// sgom mo/ sgom bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang ma
221b5('bum): ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur da to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
221b6('bum): yus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur
221b7('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la spyad pas myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ myi mnyam
221b8('bum): ba dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ myi mnyam pa dang
222a1('bum): mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ myi mnyam pa'i dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
222a2('bum): par gyur to// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la spyad pas myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyurang to//
222a3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang maH
222a4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// ma byond pa/ 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la spyad pas
222a5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par 'gyur ro/
222a6('bum): kyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// da ltar zung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang zhes/
222a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
222a8('bum): ba'i 'du shes thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur da to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// de lta lags pas
222b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'tshal pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
222b2('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la pyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas phyag bgyi ba lags so//
222b3('bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan sa kyi nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// rigs
222b4('bum): kyi dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhind te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa dag
222b5('bum): ni lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pas phyag bya bar 'os pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ myi'i 'jig rten
222b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i
222b7('bum): rigs dag 'jig rten du 'thung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'thung bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
222b8('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rte du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
223a1('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba
223a2('bum): 'gyur ro// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
223a3('bum): 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed
223a4('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
223a5('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
223a6('bum): che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'thung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i la
223a7('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
223a8('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa' rnams/
223b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// land cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du
223b2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
223b3('bum): pa ram bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ bza' ba dang / btung
223b4('bum): ba dang / bzhon pa dang / kos dang / mal cha dang / khyim da dang / 'tsho ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / ka ser dang / dngul dag kyang
223b5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad myi'i rkyen dang / lha rdzas su bya ba'am yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba yang
223b6('bum): rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang
223b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i pyad pa pyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la gnas te/ bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro// bdag tshul khrims srung zhing / gzhan
223b8('bum): yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro// bdag bzod pa sgom zhing / gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro// bdag brtson 'grus chom zhing / gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro// bdag bsam gtan
224a1('bum): skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro// bdag shes rab sgom zhing / gzhan yang shes rab sgom pa la sbyor ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtend cing //
224a2('bum): sems can rnams pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod de/ de dag pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyod pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob bo//
224a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i dond tu bzhugs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
224a4('bum): zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste stong ka sum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdza da do// de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro
224a5('bum): ba kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur da to// de byung nas shar da phyogs kyi 'ji ga rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
224a6('bum): rgyas par gyur rto lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
224a7('bum): ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// byang shard kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khas
224a8('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur da to/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur da to lho nub
224b1('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung ki bye ma snyed snang
224b2('bum): ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten ki khams gang ka'i
224b3('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to// de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od
224b4('bum): rnam par bye ba de mthong nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba
224b5('bum): chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgakis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub
224b6('bum): phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shashig kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhug
224b7('bum): ste/ des zhal gyi spro nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi
224b8('bum): khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems
225a1('bum): dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi lam/
225a2('bum): 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsald pa rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang phyogs logs na
225a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas
225a4('bum): ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsta nad pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
225a5('bum): ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snye da po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a6('bum): de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang
225a7('bum): ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni sher phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams
225a8('bum): myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas
225b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag sdang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//
225b2('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi sangs
225b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bcom
225b4('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ka 'di ni lho phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
225b5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas lnga kas kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
225b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stand pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar
225b7('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
225b8('bum): zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs
226a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/
226a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
226a3('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
226a4('bum): khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs
226a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos pa ltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so//
226a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub kyang kyi phyogs mtshams logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
226a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas byang chub sems dang
226a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho nub
226b1('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
226b2('bum): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bco
226b3('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byed sha rad kyi phyogs mtshams logs na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
226b4('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226b5('bum): chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstand pa 'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma ste da po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//
226b6('bum): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas
226b7('bum): kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten ki khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu' lags shes yongs su dris so//
226b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni sher lho'i phyogs mtshams logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
227a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub
